sentences.en: Aloe Vera is used in moisturisers to give them a wonderfully silky texture.
sentences.cn: 芦荟用于润肤霜中，使之具有美妙的丝般润滑感。
克莱尔捋了捋凯蒂如丝般的秀发。

sentences.en: He spoke in a silky tone.
Her hair was very long and silky.
sentences.cn: 她一头长发,柔软而光洁.

sentences.en: His fingers closed on something small and silky.
sentences.cn: 他的手指头抓住一件又小又柔软的东西.

sentences.en: His light hair was very long and silky.
sentences.cn: 他的浅色头发很长,很光滑.

sentences.en: I had the car for two years and much enjoyed its excellent handling, quietness and silky gearchange.
sentences.cn: 我的车买了两年了，我非常喜欢它卓越的操控性，安静舒适的驾车环境和平稳流畅的换挡操作。

sentences.en: It a silky pink primer that makes skin appear smoother & brighter.
sentences.cn: 这款丝绸般柔滑的粉红色底霜可以让肌肤变得更加幼滑 和 明亮.

sentences.en: Its fur is short, dense and silky.
sentences.cn: 它的毛又短又密，柔软光洁。

sentences.en: Some people moved in silky, liquid movements, others were jerky, probably drunk.
sentences.cn: 一些人动作平稳流畅，其他人则跌跌撞撞，大概是喝醉了。

sentences.en: The dog has a soft , silky coat.
sentences.cn: 这条狗有一身柔滑而有光泽的皮毛.

sentences.en: This creature's fur is short, dense and silky.
sentences.cn: 这种动物的毛又短又密、丝般柔滑。

sentences.en: This kind of mixer produces light, silky, even-textured batters.
sentences.cn: 这种搅拌机能搅拌出稀薄、柔滑、质地均匀的面糊。

sentences.en: This shampoo smells fruity and leaves the hair beautifully silky.
sentences.cn: 这款洗发水是果香型的，洗后头发如丝般顺滑。

words.tran_cn: 如丝绸一般地；（谈吐等）温和的
丝的；柔滑的；温和的；丝绸一样的

trans.tran_cn: 丝一样的，像绸缎的，柔软的，光滑的，优雅的，（酒）舐着舒服的
trans.tran_en: soft, smooth, and shiny like silk
